name: Robo Do It
description: Robo Do It is a funny game to learn logic programming without writing code by building scripts to program robots in each level. The goal is to find the best solution to create an algorithm that takes these robots into victory capsules.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2 Processor: 2.4 GHz or faster processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Shader Model 2 & at least 512MB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space
